root.Summary: 1: Liu Y, Luo F, Wang B, Li H, Xu Y, Liu X, Shi L, Lu X, Xu W, Lu L, Qin Y, XiangQ, Liu Q. STAT3-regulated exosomal miR-21 promotes angiogenesis and is involvedin neoplastic processes of transformed human bronchial epithelial cells.
